mapper.select: SELECT s.sup_id, s.user_id, s.dept_id, s.student_name, s.thesis_title, s.level, s.year, s.word_file_name, s.status, s.reject_reason, u.user_name, u.email as user_email, d.dept_name FROM supervision s LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d ON s.dept_id = d.dept_id ORDER BY s.sup_id DESC

SELECT s.sup_id, s.user_id, s.dept_id, s.student_name, s.thesis_title, s.level, s.year, s.word_file_name, s.status, s.reject_reason, u.user_name, u.email as user_email, d.dept_name FROM supervision s LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d ON s.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE s.sup_id = #{id}

SELECT s.sup_id, s.user_id, s.dept_id, s.student_name, s.thesis_title, s.level, s.year, s.status, s.reject_reason, u.user_name, u.email as user_email, d.dept_name FROM supervision s LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d ON s.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE s.status = #{status} ORDER BY s.sup_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supervision ( user_id, dept_id, student_name, thesis_title, level, year, word_file_name, status ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{deptId}, #{studentName}, #{thesisTitle}, #{level}, #{year}, #{wordFileName}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE supervision SET user_id = #{userId}, dept_id = #{deptId}, student_name = #{studentName}, thesis_title = #{thesisTitle}, level = #{level}, year = #{year}, word_file_name = #{wordFileName}, status = #{status}, reject_reason = #{rejectReason} WHERE sup_id = #{supId}
